admin.grafana: More analytics can be found in Grafana.

recommendedAction.title: Recommended action
recommendedAction.clinicTitle: Request appointment with the Idea Clinic
recommendedAction.clinicContent:
Please add a background description for your question 
 
 1. Possible project name 
 
 2. The main funding sources (Academy, EU, BF, Foundations, etc..) related to this question 
 
 3. Name possible collaborators (industry, universities, etc) 
 
 4. Possible prior commitments you have already made 
 
 5. Finally, please specify your question. All this will help you to receive a more specific first response
recommendedAction.legalTitle: Request appointment with the University of Helsinki Legal Services
recommendedAction.legalContent:
Please add a background description for your question 
 
 1. Possible project name 
 
 2. The main funding sources (Academy, EU, BF, Foundations, etc..) related to this question 
 
 3. Name possible collaborators (industry, universities, etc) 
 
 4. Possible prior commitments you have already made 
 
 5. Finally, please specify your question. All this will help you to receive a more specific first response
recommendedAction.relationsTitle: Request appointment with the Business Collaboration Team
recommendedAction.relationsContent:
Please add a background description for your question 
 
 1. Possible project name 
 
 2. The main funding sources (Academy, EU, BF, Foundations, etc..) related to this question 
 
 3. Name possible collaborators (industry, universities, etc) 
 
 4. Possible prior commitments you have already made 
 
 5. Finally, please specify your question. All this will help you to receive a more specific first response

services.disclosureTitle: Visit the Invention Disclosure page for more information
services.disclosureContent: [Invention disclosure](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/helsinki-innovation-services/university-staff/invention-disclosure) is a part of the [commercialization process](https://www.helsinki.fi/assets/drupal/2021-10/invention-guidelines-of-the-university-of-helsinki.pdf) at the University of Helsinki to evaluate patentability and commercial potential of all ideas.
services.incubatorTitle: Visit the Incubator and Entrepreneurship Services page for more information
services.incubatorContent: The University's [Incubator and Entrepreneurship Services](https://flamma.helsinki.fi/en/group/tutkimuksen-tuki/hautomo-ja-yrittajyyspalvelut) offer easily accessible programmes, courses, and services to support the development, launch, and growth of business ideas.
services.relationsTitle: Visit the Business collaboration page for more information
services.relationsContent: The [business collaboration team](https://flamma.helsinki.fi/en/group/tutkimuksen-tuki/yritysyhteistyo-ja-kumppanuudet) helps researchers when they wish to collaborate with businesses or apply for funding related to business collaboration from, for example, Business Finland or the Finnish Research Impact Foundation.
services.gnugplTitle: Before making the decision we suggest you fill in Idea Evaluation and Patentability Evaluation surveys.
services.bsdmitTitle: Before making the decision we suggest you fill in Idea Evaluation and Patentability Evaluation surveys.
services.openSourceLegalSuggestionTitle: Should you have questions on use of permissive or restrictive licenses, please contact legal-team for support.

extraAction.title: Based on your selections you may also be interested in these
extraAction.shareResultsTitle: Would you like to have the summary send to your email or share your results with others
extraAction.shareResultsContent: New emails are inputted by typing the email address and pressing enter
extraAction.shareResultInputPlaceholder: Type in email addresses to share
extraAction.pateSuccessMessage: Shared results with provided email addresses

surveySelect.introMessage: How can we help you today?

mainPage.mainHeading: Make a difference in the world
mainPage.mainContent: Welcome {{name}} to your personal space of Innotin. Innotin, you will secure your idea, invention or software and help you to proceed with your patenting process
mainPage.toolSelectionQuestion: Which of these surveys would you like to use?

surveySelectionNames.ideaEvaluation: How to proceed with my idea

surveyInfos.ipAssessment: Patentability evaluation consideration consists of three distinct domains of patent legislation, meeting the patentability criteria in one domain is sufficient for patentability. Patentability evaluation or invention disclosure may or may not result in patent application.
surveyInfos.licences: Software licensing evaluation will assist on going through some of the elementary license selection questions. An Idea Clinic meeting is highly recommended for all situation involving companies or potential commercial use of the software / intellectual property.
surveyInfos.ideaEvaluation: Ideas may be early-stage concepts without a solid hypothesis or proof, or sometimes rather mature technical or business innovations. This questionnaire will support you on identification of suitable next steps.

sideBarServices.disclosure: [Invention disclosure](https://flamma.helsinki.fi/en/group/tutkimuksen-tuki/keksinnon-oikeudet-ja-suojaus) is a part of the [commercialization process](https://www.helsinki.fi/assets/drupal/2021-10/invention-guidelines-of-the-university-of-helsinki.pdf) at the University of Helsinki to evaluate patentability and commercial potential of all ideas.
sideBarServices.clinic: Idea Clinic is personal 1-to-1 meeting to explore the possibilities of your idea with a commercialization expert. You may request a meeting by filling in the Idea survey or by emailing [his@helsinki.fi](mailto:his@helsinki.fi)
sideBarServices.incubator: The University's [Incubator and Entrepreneurship Services](https://flamma.helsinki.fi/en/group/tutkimuksen-tuki/hautomo-ja-yrittajyyspalvelut) offer easily accessible programmes, courses, and services to support the development, launch, and growth of business ideas.
sideBarServices.relations: The [business collaboration team](https://flamma.helsinki.fi/en/group/tutkimuksen-tuki/yritysyhteistyo-ja-kumppanuudet) helps researchers when they wish to collaborate with businesses or apply for funding related to business collaboration from, for example, Business Finland or the Finnish Research Impact Foundation.
sideBarServices.legal: The [lawyers of the research services](https://flamma.helsinki.fi/en/group/tutkimuksen-tuki/tutkimussopimus-ja-lakiasiat) assist the employees of the university with legal matters related to research, for example, with agreement preparation and interpreting regulations as well as data protection matters.

ipAssessmentSurvey.patentable: ### Overall recommendation is to file an invention disclosure to HIS.
ipAssessmentSurvey.notPatentable: ### Overall recommendation is to schedule an idea clinic appointment with HIS.
ipAssessmentSurvey.technicalPatentable: **For this section, requirements for patentability potentially fulfilled**. Please file an invention disclosure to HIS.
ipAssessmentSurvey.technicalNotPatentable: **For this section, requirements for patentability not fulfilled**. Please book an idea clinic appointment with HIS.
ipAssessmentSurvey.mathematicalPatentable: **For this section, requirements for patentability potentially fulfilled**. Please file an invention disclosure to HIS.
ipAssessmentSurvey.mathematicalNotPatentable: **For this section, requirements for patentability not fulfilled**. Please book an idea clinic appointment with HIS.
ipAssessmentSurvey.computerProgramPatentable: **For this section, requirements for patentability potentially fulfilled**. Please file an invention disclosure to HIS.
ipAssessmentSurvey.computerProgramNotPatentable: **For this section, requirements for patentability not fulfilled**. Please complete the licensing questionnaire and book and idea clinic appointment with HIS.
